structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section:
For the purposes of KRS 65.410 to 65.460 the local legislative bodies may:
Appropriate funds;
Issue and sell their revenue bonds and general obligation bonds in the manner and within the limitations prescribed by the applicable laws of the Commonwealth; and
Exercise their powers under KRS 65.410 to 65.460 through a board or commission, or through such office or officers as the local legislative bodies by resolution determine.
